> By the way if anyone has any suggestions for the neuroevolution domain
> I'd be happy to hear them.

What about something similar to evoweb?

http://evonet.dcs.napier.ac.uk/

Except more geared towards NE. You could setup some kind of centralized
repository for information about groups working in neuro-evolution. This
would really help in the process of moving neuro-evolution from an
academic pursuit more into the mainstream.

-- 

Joseph Reisinger
